$!When you buy goods or services the law protects your consumer rights.$!

This means you can get help if you're treated unfairly or when things go wrong. This includes:

- faulty goods
- poor service
- problems with contracts
- problems with builders
- rogue traders

Citizens Advice can give you help and advice about your consumer rights.

$C 
**Citizens Advice**  
[www.adviceguide.org.uk](http://www.adviceguide.org.uk/ "Citizens Advice"){:rel="external"}  
08454 04 05 06  
08454 04 05 05 (Welsh language) 
$C
overview: Consumer rights and protection for goods and services - returning faulty goods, consumer credit, refunds
title: Consumer rights
